name: Uru: Ages Beyond Myst
summary: From the makers of Myst and Riven comes the next chapter of the Myst franchise. In Uru: Ages Beyond Myst, you'll journey through a variety of different ages and discover the lost civilization of the D'ni people. This time, you don't have to point and click to move around--you can explore each age in real-time 3D. Create your own character and spend hours discovering mysterious areas, solving a large variety of mind-challenging puzzles, and following an epic storyline.
